attributes.action: save drama and studies alike and keep them as GCSE subjects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is created to keep Drama in schools. Drama should not be took off the National Curriculum because students can study it and feel free to become young new actors in the future. Taking away Drama may jepodise the futures of many, and some cannot afford going to extra drama groups to practise their talents.
